td.content: s:pt presents with Liver for 4 weeks. she is a white F aged 37 Ys. she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in her past o:Height 176 cm, Weight 79.8 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Cirrhosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.
